spell_tooltip.description: You fly into the air out of harm's way. While floating, you gain access to Fel Lance allowing you to deal damage to enemies below.
Vengeful Retreat provides immunity to loss of control effects, and reduces damage taken by 35% until you land.
Immolation Aura dispels a magical effect on you when cast.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 16,886 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
You heal for 3% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 55,723 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Consume 1 beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target.
Increases your chance to parry by 3%.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and snares all enemies hit by 50% for 6 sec.

Charge to your target and deal 135,167 Fire damage.

Demon Blades has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.

When you parry an attack or have one of your attacks parried, restore 2% of max health and 10 Fury. 

This effect may only occur once every 5 sec.
Mastery increases your movement speed.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Spectral Sight has 5 sec reduced cooldown and no longer reduces movement speed.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Eye Beam causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
Increases your mastery by 4.5%.

Summons darkness around you in an 8 yd radius, granting friendly targets a 15% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts 8 sec.

Chance to avoid damage increased by 100% when not in a raid.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
The cooldown of Fel Rush is reduced by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.
Eye Beam summons an allied Vengeance Demon Hunter who casts Fel Devastation, dealing 261,939 Fire damage over 2 sec. Dealing damage heals you for up to 18,378 health.

Charge to your target, striking them for 1.2 million Chaos damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting 910,014 Chaos damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for 10% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for 20 sec.

Blasts all enemies in front of you, dealing guaranteed critical strikes for up to 1.5 million Chaos damage over 1.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
The chance that Chaos Strike will refund 20 Fury is increased by 30% of your critical strike chance.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 20,707 Shadow damage and generate 7-12 Fury.
Immolation Aura generates an additional 40 Fury over 10 sec.
Chaos Strike damage increased by 10%.
Blade Dance deals 625,117 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Magical damage increased by 3%, and Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Slip into the nether, increasing movement speed by 100% and becoming immune to damage, but unable to attack. Lasts 6 sec.
You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to 15% of your maximum health.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by 10% for 5 sec.

Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to trigger this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
Increases Versatility by 4% and reduces threat generated by 8%.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional 148,346 Chaos damage over 4 sec.
Vengeful Retreat has a 5 sec reduced cooldown and generates 80 Fury over 10 sec.
Eye Beam deals guaranteed critical strikes.
The final slash of Blade Dance deals an additional 50% damage.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat cause your next Fel Rush or Felblade to empower you, increasing damage by 18% for 5 sec.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Enemies hit by Chaos Strike or Throw Glaive take 15% increased damage from Chaos Strike and Throw Glaive for 15 sec.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase the damage of your next Fel Rush or Felblade by 300%. Lasts 12 sec.
Blade Dance causes your next Chaos Strike within 8 sec to have a 14-30% increased critical strike chance and will always refund Fury.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 438,858 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Chaos Strike has a 10% chance to trigger a second Chaos Strike.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 80% of your critical strike chance.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 7 total times.
Slash all enemies in front of you for 581,958 Chaos damage, and increase the damage your Chaos Strike and Blade Dance deal to them by 80% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

Metamorphosis now also causes Demon Blades to generate 3 additional Fury.

While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing 358,769 Fire damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Movement speed increased by 1% per 10 Fury.

Demonsurge deals 50% increased damage when it strikes a single target.

Each additional target reduces this bonus by 10%.

5% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over 6 sec.

Fire damage taken reduced by 10%.
Your blades burn with Fel energy, causing your Chaos Strike, Throw Glaive, and auto-attacks to deal an additional 50% damage as Fire over 6 sec.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of your Sigil of Flame and Immolation Aura are immediately reset.
The effects of your demon form persist outside of it in a weakened state, increasing Chaos Strike and Blade Dance damage by 15%, and Haste by 5%.
Maximum Fury increased by 50.
Sigil of Flame applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by 18.0% and granting 5 Fury every 2 sec, for 6 sec.
Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.

Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Eye Beam, Immolation Aura, and Sigil of Flame.

Demonsurge damage is increased by 10% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 17,235 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 3% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 56,986 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Increases your chance to parry by 3%.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and 10 yard increased range.

Charge to your target and deal 138,169 Fire damage.

Demon Blades has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.

When you parry an attack or have one of your attacks parried, restore 2% of max health and 10 Fury. 

This effect may only occur once every 5 sec.
Mastery increases your movement speed.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Spectral Sight has 5 sec reduced cooldown and no longer reduces movement speed.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Eye Beam causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
Increases your mastery by 4.5%.

Summons darkness around you in an 8 yd radius, granting friendly targets a 15% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts 8 sec.

Chance to avoid damage increased by 100% when not in a raid.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates 1 Lesser Soul Fragment.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Enemies deal 8% reduced magic damage to you for 8 sec after being afflicted by one of your Sigils.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.

Charge to your target, striking them for 1.2 million Chaos damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting 910,014 Chaos damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for 10% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for 20 sec.

Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Detonates to deal 957,892 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Blasts all enemies in front of you, dealing guaranteed critical strikes for up to 1.4 million Chaos damage over 1.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
The chance that Chaos Strike will refund 20 Fury is increased by 30% of your critical strike chance.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 20,701 Shadow damage and generate 7-12 Fury.
Immolation Aura generates an additional 40 Fury over 10 sec.
Chaos Strike damage increased by 10%.
Blade Dance deals 616,201 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Throw Glaive deals 60% increased damage, reduced by 30% for each previous enemy hit.
Magical damage increased by 3%, and Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Slip into the nether, increasing movement speed by 100% and becoming immune to damage, but unable to attack. Lasts 6 sec.
You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to 15% of your maximum health.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by 10% for 5 sec.

Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to trigger this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
Increases Versatility by 4% and reduces threat generated by 8%.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional 148,346 Chaos damage over 4 sec.
Vengeful Retreat has a 5 sec reduced cooldown and generates 80 Fury over 10 sec.
Eye Beam deals guaranteed critical strikes.
The final slash of Blade Dance deals an additional 50% damage.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Enemies hit by Chaos Strike or Throw Glaive take 15% increased damage from Chaos Strike and Throw Glaive for 15 sec.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 438,858 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Throw Glaive causes targets to take an additional 80% of damage dealt as Chaos over 6 sec.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 80% of your critical strike chance.
Activating Eye Beam reduces the cooldown of your next Eye Beam by 5.0 sec, stacking up to 20 sec.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 7 total times.
Slash all enemies in front of you for 568,457 Chaos damage, and increase the damage your Chaos Strike and Blade Dance deal to them by 80% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Blade Dance casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Chaos Strike, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Chaos Strike applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 6% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Blade Dance, Reaver's Mark is increased to 12%.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional 15% of the amount healed.

Expose weaknesses in the target of your Reaver's Mark, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal 20% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Chaos Strike deals 10% increased damage.
Throw Glaive deals 19,776 Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.

Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Chaos Strike to deal 39,552 additional Physical damage.

Felblade consumes up to 5 nearby Soul Fragments.
After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by 15% for 20 sec and your damage and healing by 15% for 10 sec.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 17,277 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.

Demon Blades and Throw Glaive leave open wounds on your enemies, dealing 151,333 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 40%.

May be applied to up to 3 targets.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase the damage of your next Fel Rush or Felblade by 300%. Lasts 12 sec.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 438,858 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Each time Immolation Aura deals damage, 30% of the damage dealt by up to 3 critical strikes is gathered as Ragefire.

When Immolation Aura expires you explode, dealing all stored Ragefire damage to nearby enemies.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 80% of your critical strike chance.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 7 total times.

Immolation Aura has 1 additional charge, 30% chance to refund a charge when used, and deals Chaos damage instead of Fire.

You can have multiple Immolation Auras active at a time.

You can have multiple Immolation Auras active at a time.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Blade Dance casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Chaos Strike, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Chaos Strike applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 6% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Blade Dance, Reaver's Mark is increased to 12%.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Felblade surrounds you with a Blade Ward, reducing damage taken by 10% for 5 sec.

Expose weaknesses in the target of your Reaver's Mark, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal 20% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Chaos Strike deals 10% increased damage.
Throw Glaive deals 19,776 Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.

Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Chaos Strike to deal 39,552 additional Physical damage.

Felblade consumes up to 5 nearby Soul Fragments.
After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by 15% for 20 sec and your damage and healing by 15% for 10 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Sigils by an additional 25%.
Imprison's PvP duration is increased by 1 sec, and targets become immune to damage and healing while imprisoned.
Immolation Aura dispels a magical effect on you when cast.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 17,213 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 15 sec.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 3% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 57,712 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Increases your chance to parry by 3%.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and 10 yard increased range.

Charge to your target and deal 134,288 Fire damage.

Demon Blades has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Immolation Aura increases your armor by 20% and causes melee attackers to suffer 6,681 Fire damage.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Eye Beam causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
Increases your mastery by 4.5%.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates 1 Lesser Soul Fragment.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
The cooldown of Fel Rush is reduced by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.
Eye Beam summons an allied Vengeance Demon Hunter who casts Fel Devastation, dealing 267,028 Fire damage over 2 sec. Dealing damage heals you for up to 19,130 health.

Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Detonates to deal 935,714 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you for 299,572 Fire damage over 2 sec.

Enemies struck by Sigil of Flame are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.

You heal for 8% of all damage you deal to targets with Frailty.
Brand an enemy with a demonic symbol, instantly dealing 201,148 Fire damage. The enemy's damage done to you is reduced by 40% for 12 sec.

Rapidly slash your target for 119,541 Physical damage, and shatter 2 Lesser Soul Fragments from them.

Generates 25 Fury.
Demon Spikes also increases your Parry chance by 10% for 8 sec.

Sigil of Flame's initial damage is increased by 50%.

Multiple applications of Sigil of Flame may overlap.
Reduces the cooldown of Throw Glaive by 6 sec.

Place a Sigil of Silence at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Silences all enemies affected by the sigil for 2 sec.

Consume up to 5 available Soul Fragments then explode, damaging nearby enemies for 35,923 Fire damage per fragment consumed, and afflicting them with Frailty for 6 sec, causing you to heal for 8% of damage you deal to them. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Immolation Aura increases your movement speed by 10% and its duration is increased by 50%.
Increases the duration of Demon Spikes by 2 sec.
Fire damage increased by 8%.

Frailty now also reduces all damage you take from afflicted targets by 3%.

Enemies struck by Soul Cleave are afflicted with Frailty for 6 sec.
Immolation Aura's initial burst has a chance to shatter Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies.

Immolation Aura generates 5-10 Fury when it deals critical damage.

This effect may only occur once per 1 sec.
You take 10% reduced magic damage while Immolation Aura is active.
Every 10 Soul Fragments you consume increases the damage of your next Soul Cleave or Spirit Bomb by 40%.
Fiery Brand also increases Fire damage you deal to the target by 30%.
Increases the duration of your Sigils by 2 sec and radius by 2 yds.
Soul Cleave deals 50% increased damage to your primary target.
Every 1 sec, Fiery Brand spreads to one nearby enemy.
Frailty now also increases all damage you deal to afflicted targets by 4%.
Immolation Aura damage increases the duration of your Fiery Brand and Sigil of Flame by 0.50 sec.

Multiple applications of Frailty may overlap.

Soul Cleave applies Frailty to your primary target for 8 sec.

Carve into the soul of your target, dealing 300,699 Fire damage and an additional 131,050 Fire damage over 3 sec.  Immediately shatters 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from the target and 1 additional Lesser Soul Fragment every 1 sec.
When Fel Devastation finishes fully channeling, it refreshes 15-30% of its cooldown and refunds 15-30 Fury.

Sigil of Flame has 5 sec reduced cooldown and 1 additional charge.

You have 12% increased chance to parry attacks from enemies afflicted by your Sigil of Flame.
Chaos Nova slows enemies by 60% and reduces attack and cast speed 15% for 5 sec after its stun fades.

Demonsurge deals 50% increased damage when it strikes a single target.

Each additional target reduces this bonus by 10%.

5% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over 6 sec.

Fire damage taken reduced by 10%.
Your blades burn with Fel energy, causing your Chaos Strike, Throw Glaive, and auto-attacks to deal an additional 50% damage as Fire over 6 sec.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of your Sigil of Flame and Immolation Aura are immediately reset.
The effects of your demon form persist outside of it in a weakened state, increasing Chaos Strike and Blade Dance damage by 15%, and Haste by 5%.
Maximum Fury increased by 50.
Sigil of Flame applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by 18.0% and granting 5 Fury every 2 sec, for 6 sec.
Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.

Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Eye Beam, Immolation Aura, and Sigil of Flame.

Demonsurge damage is increased by 10% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.
